#sidebar TableOfContents
The UpgradeType class is used to get information about a particular upgrade.

Methods:

  * [#getID getID]
  * [#getName getName]
  * [#getRace getRace]
  * [#mineralPriceBase mineralPriceBase]
  * [#mineralPriceFactor mineralPriceFactor]
  * [#gasPriceBase gasPriceBase]
  * [#gasPriceFactor gasPriceFactor]
  * [#whatUpgrades whatUpgrades]

=== getID ===
int getID();

=== getName ===
std::string getName();

=== getRace ===
[Race] getRace();

Returns the race the upgrade is for. For example, UpgradeTypes::Terran_Infantry_Armor.getRace() will return Races::Terran.

=== mineralPriceBase ===
int mineralPriceBase();

int mineralPriceFactor();

=== gasPriceBase ===
int gasPriceBase();

=== gasPriceFactor ===
int gasPriceFactor();

=== whatUpgrades ===
[UnitType]{{{*}}} whatUpgrades();
